attributes.action: Change the national anthem to, I Vow to Thee, My Country
attributes.additional_details:
The national anthem should be about our country as a whole, not just about one person. The national anthem should some up everything great about being British. It needs to show pride, honour and passion. So I suggest that we change our National Anthem to:  I Vow to Thee, My Country. I personally feel that this song encapsulates everything that Britain should be about.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7MG27BKwjaI
